layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x122
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x122
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x98
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 471x18
          text run at (0,0) width 471: "The three boxes below should have progressively thinner bottom borders."
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,34) size 66x64 [color=#000080]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (0,0) size 66x64
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 66x60
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,2) size 20x60 [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 18x26 [border: (3px solid #000080) (5px solid #000080) (3px solid #000080)]
                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 12x18
                  text run at (3,3) width 12: "A"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (24,2) size 19x58 [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 17x24 [border: (3px solid #000080)]
                LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 11x18
                  text run at (3,3) width 11: "B"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (45,2) size 19x56 [r=0 c=2 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (1,17) size 17x22 [border: (3px solid #000080) (1px solid #000080) (3px solid #000080)]
